SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.User
HMS.src.user.Patient
public class Patient extends User
Represents a patient in the Hospital Management System. Extends the User class and contains patient-specific details such as medical records, appointments, and contact information.

    • Patient

      public Patient(String name, String patientId, LocalDate dateOfBirth, Gender gender, ContactInformation contactInfo, String bloodType, List<MedicalRecord> medicalRecord, List<Appointment> appointment)
      Constructs a new Patient object with all details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the patient.
      patientId - The unique identifier for the patient.
      dateOfBirth - The date of birth of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      contactInfo - The contact information of the patient.
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient.
      medicalRecord - The list of medical records associated with the patient.
      appointment - The list of appointments associated with the patient.
